name: DataCategoryGroupSobjectTypePair

constructors.name: DataCategoryGroupSobjectTypePair
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the Schema.DataCategoryGroupSobjectTypePair class.

methods.name: getDataCategoryGroupName
methods.description: Returns the unique name used by the API to access the data category group.

methods.name: getSobject
methods.description: Returns the object name associated with the data category group.

methods.name: setDataCategoryGroupName
methods.description: Specifies the unique name used by the API to access the data category group.

methods.name: setSobject
methods.description: Sets the sObject associated with the data category group.

params.name: sObjectName
params.description: The sObjectName is the object name associated with the data category group. Valid values are:  KnowledgeArticleVersion—for article types.   Question—for questions from Answers.

description: Specifies a category group and an associated object.
